programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Sandy / The Inside Job - Plankton steals Sandy's fur to disguise himself as Sandy and get the Krabby Patty formula. // Plankton goes inside SpongeBob's head to get the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep125
programme.desc: You're Fired! / Mirror, Mirror on the Armoire - After another mishap, Clumsy and Dimwitty get into a big fight and vow never to work with each other again. // When Gargamel places a magic armoire in the forest, Vanity must resist the temptation to look into its mirror.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Old and the Restless - When Lincoln sees how tame Pop Pop has gotten in his older age, he takes him out for a day to remember.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Time Trap! - When the kids break Mom and Dad's priceless vase, they decide the only thing to do is go back in time to their wedding day, and prevent them from ever receiving it.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Secret Legacy Pt. 2 - Robby has trouble adjusting after his family's big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep170
programme.desc: Free Samples / Home Sweet Rubble - After Plankton drives away Mr. Krabs' customers, Mr. Krabs is forced to give out free Krabby Patties to try to win them back. // SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and he needs all of his friends to help him remodel it!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep171
programme.desc: Karen 2.0 / InSpongeiac - When Plankton replaces his computer wife Karen with the new, better Karen 2, the original Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob cant get to sleep, and asks for help from Patrick who cant stay awake.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep172
programme.desc: Face Freeze! / Glove World R.I.P. - SpongeBob and Patrick make a bet to see who can hold a "funny face" the longest...then their faces freeze that way! // SpongeBob and Patrick spend one last glorious - and dangerous - day at Glove World before it closes for good.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep181
programme.desc: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby - SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep252
programme.desc: Mind the Gap / Dirty Bubble Returns - Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBob's teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. // The newly reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lost in Couch / Pat-a-thon - Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep308
programme.desc: The Puppetmaster - In a Halloween installment, the gang looks into strange disappearances in a spooky town. There, an old lady named Hama teaches Katara some secret Waterbending techniques.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Thumb Drive - The penguins need a thumb, and Maurice's fits the bill nicely.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper / High Moltage - Its off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. // The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action stars blockbuster movie!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Operation: Big Blue Marble - The Penguins are faced with a global battle when their specialty food-making machine belches out a toxic cloud that threatens not just the zoo, not just the city, but the earth itself!

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Driver's Breaducation / Food Fight Club - After wracking up a ton of tickets from Chief Rambamboo, SwaySway and Buhdeuce get sent to traffic school. // They discover an underground Food Fight Club, and they're gonna have to food fight to save their beaks!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep109
programme.desc: King Swelly Belly / Yard Sale Fail - Ollie and monster gut slug, Jeffrey, team up to help one another win an eating contest and find love. // After Ollie's mom sells his beloved preschool toys at a yard sale, he and CW investigate the suspected buyers.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Stuck on You / Al Be Back - After an unfortunate "glue" accident, the Turtles have to fight a whole host of villains. // The Turtles' first public musical gig is interrupted by Albearto and his animatronic army.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Giving G / Release the Craigan - An amazing discovery at the junkyard causes trouble in the neighborhood. // Craig steals Megan's identity and becomes a pageant queen.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Dorg and the Germ / Dorg the Troublemaker - Dorg is sick. The Magicals become microscopic to help fight the cold! // The new art teacher decides Dorg's a troublemaker, the gang will do anything to get back in the teacher's good books and win a prize at Art Day!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Saving Private Chum Chum / Jingle Fever - Mr. Mufflin takes away everyone's toys in class. Unfortunately this includes taking away Chum Chum! // When Fanboy and Chum Chum find out they can win a million Frosty Bucks by writing the new Frosty Mart jingle.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Top Dog / Quack in the Box - While Dudley bustingly takes over for a sick Chief, The fiendish League of Potential Perpetrators attempts to make their crime debut! // Quacky and the Sharing Moose are back to get revenge on Dudley for putting them in jail.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Return to Alfea - The Winx learn that to defeat Tritannus, they must gain a new power; Sirenix. Bloom's sister Daphne tells her the Sirenix Book is in an Alfea Library. When Sky saves Bloom from the Trix, he hits his head and loses his memory.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep504
programme.desc: The Sirenix Book - The Winx use Tecna's tech-savvy skills to find the Sirenix Book, but the Trix interfere with the Winx' search. When Tritannus learns of the Winx' mission to achieve Sirenix, he too, seeks to obtain it.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Catlantic City / Scaredy Cat - Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. // Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Of Mice and Munks - The Chipettes fall in love with a cute little mouse that's doomed to be fed to a snake as part of a science class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Simon Saves the World - Simon's new invention threatens to destroy the world, creating a time loop and changing gravity inside the house.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Geizmo's Day Out - When Alvin kidnaps Simon's robot Geizmo, he gets a lesson in parenting a child going through their terrible twos.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Squawk in the Name of Love / Date with Destiny - Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back! // Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep221
programme.desc: No Laughing Matter / No Spoilers - When Luan overhears her siblings complaining about her comedy, she decides to give it up. // Knowing Leni's history of spoiling surprises, the kids don't tell her about Mom's upcoming party.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Legends / Mall of Duty - Dad and Lincoln get on "Legends of the Hidden Temple" and can't wait to for a whole day of father/son bonding. // Lincoln wants to go to the mall but has to watch his younger sisters so he decides to take them to the mall.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep518

programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: 7.3 Ep120
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: The Drum Ep139
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S33 Ep10
programme.desc: Jane Edmanson explores the flora of Lord Howe Island, Josh Byrne meets a young beekeeper, Millie Ross makes a seedling tray, Costa Georgiadis gets a taste for green ants in Kakadu, and Hannah Moloney introduces her goats.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep155
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep155
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep155
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Gemma Veness brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S33 Ep11
programme.desc: Jerry Coleby-Williams explores Cairns Botanic Gardens, Millie Ross shows how to harness the growing power of smoke, Jane Edmanson visits a tiny but terrific courtyard, and Costa Georgiadis holds a masterclass on worms.

programme.title: The China Century - Unify The Motherland S1 Ep3
programme.desc: China's return to imperial power after a century of humiliation.

programme.title: Food Safari Water - Sea Treasures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Exploring the treasures of the Water - prized abalone, caviar, and sea vegetables used in Chinese, Greek and Japanese recipes.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep7

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep135
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep155
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep140
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC News Ep216
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Mary Gearin (Fri-Sat).

programme.desc: Round 21 of the AFL season kicks off with the Western Bulldogs taking on Richmond at Marvel Stadium in Friday Night Footy. Could finals hopes be dashed tonight?

programme.title: The World Ep155

programme.title: Planet America Ep1
programme.desc: The race to the 2024 Presidential Election is on. Around a dozen Republican candidates are taking on frontrunner Donald Trump, while Joe Biden is running for re-election. Chas and John guide you through every step of the way.

programme.title: Paramedics S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mark and Carina race to help a critically injured paraglider who's crashed into a cliff. A case of bed bugs makes Michelle nervous. Jamie and Mike struggle to convince a cyclist hit by a car that she needs to go to hospital.

Have a look at African life and find out what is going on there in the sphere of politics, health care, business.

programme.title: The News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: Encore!
programme.desc: Get to know the latest news from the world of art and culture and watch Encore! show on France 24 from Monday to Friday. The hosts, Eve Jackson and Olivia Salazar-Winspear are both passionate about cinema, theater, fine art and culture. The show is combination of highlights of current cultural events and interviews of people who have a hand in it- musicians, artists, ballet dancers, photographers.

programme.title: The News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. After winning his first five UFC bouts, all by knockout or submission, Aspinals meteoric rise up the heavyweight ladder was momentarily halted by an injury in July of 2022. But this summer, Aspinall is back and eager to make up for lost time against Tybura, who is coming off back-to-back wins over Alexandr Romanov and Blagoy Ivanov

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Aspinall vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFC is back in London on July 22 for another action-packed event at The O2 Arena, and in the main event, its the highly anticipated return of Englands own Tom Aspinall, as he takes on Polish powerhouse Marcin Tybura in the five-rounder that closes UFC on ESPN. programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep28
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.
